sen.j: 1335年、足利尊氏が後醍醐天皇に反逆したとき、武敏は本国にあって足利側に与した少弐貞経を攻め、苦戦したもののこれを破った。
sen.e: In 1335, when Takauji ASHIKAGA opposed against Emperor Godaigo, Taketoshi attacked Sadatsune SHONI who supported the Ashikaga side in one's province, and although he suffered in the battle, he was able to defeat him.

sen.j: さらに勝勢に乗じて多々良浜の戦いで足利軍と戦った。
sen.e: Also, on top of his wins, he battled against the Ashikaga army in the Battle of Tatarahama.

sen.j: この戦いでは兵力的には武敏側が優勢であったが、所詮は寄せ集めに過ぎなかったため、肥前の松浦氏などが離反したために大敗を喫し、与党の阿蘇惟直、蒲池武久は戦死し、菊池武敏自身は命からがら本国に逃れた。
sen.e: In this battle, although Taketoshi saide had the advantage with the military force, wince it was just the random men they gathered, and due to the separation of Matsuura clan, they went through a huge defeat, and Korenao ASO and Takehisa KAMACHI of the ruling party died in this battle and Taketoshi KIKUCHI himself escaped for his life to his province.

In this battle, although Taketoshi side had the advantage with the military force, since it was just a motley army and the Matsuura clan and other clans defected, they went through a huge defeat, and Korenao ASO and Takehisa KAMACHI of the ruling party died in this battle and Taketoshi KIKUCHI himself escaped for his life to his province.

sen.e: The details about the year of his death is unknown, but after the death of his brother, Takeshige, he looked after Takehito KIKUCHI who succeeded afterwards.
